expectedBehavior: Demonstrates handling protocol errors. Should run 6 tests: (1) normal operation succeeds, (2) catches INVALID_PARAMS error, (3) catches INTERNAL_ERROR, (4) catches PERMISSION_DENIED, (5) catches SESSION_NOT_FOUND when loading unknown session, (6) demonstrates recovery after errors. Each test should show the error code and confirm it matches expected. Should end with 'Demo Complete'.
